name: MiFood: A entrega azarada
description:
MiFood is a project from the Bolando Games group, students of the 2nd semester of Game Design, during the 2nd semester of 2019. 

The proposal was to create a remake of a classic game, which in this case was the 1981 game Frogger, the player controls food delivery men who come from a long line of very unlucky delivery men who always lose the order and try to recover before the customer cancels.
